title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 05 December 2012 - XWiki
content:
<jvdrean> has quit  
00:24 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
00:34 <sdumitriu1> vmassol: Any progress on committing the release application?  
00:58 <rrodriguez> has quit  
01:12 <jvdrean> has quit  
03:21 <tekzilla> has quit  
03:23 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
05:59 <huhongbo> has joined #xwiki  
05:59 <huhongbo> I try import the word doc to convert , openoffice seems ok,I got the error com.sun.star.lang.IllegalArgumentException: URL seems to be an unsupported one.  
06:33 <sdumitriu> Hi huhongbo, I recommend writing an email to the users list with your problem  
06:33 <sdumitriu> Most develelopers are sleeping at this time  
07:39 <rrodriguez> has joined #xwiki  
07:54 <rrodriguez> has quit

09:28 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:30 <msmeria> has quit  
09:37 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:43 <jvdrean> has joined #xwiki  
09:51 <sburjan> has quit  
09:59 <mrvanes> has joined #xwiki  
10:06 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
10:13 <huhongbo> has quit  
10:26 <tmortagne> has quit  
10:26 <tmortagne1> has joined #xwiki  
10:28 <vmassol> mflorea: you stole my commit!  
10:28 <mflorea> :)  
10:28 <vmassol> I have a lot of stuff to commit  
10:28 <vmassol> regarding logging  
10:28 <vmassol> but I need to finish it before I can commit  
10:28 <vmassol> still need a few hours  
10:29 <mflorea> ok, I just wanted to make the platform build pass  
10:30 <vmassol> ah ok thanks  
10:30 <vmassol> didn't realize it was making the build fail  
10:31 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <tmortagne1> has quit  
10:37 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:44 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
11:09 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
11:12 <vmassol> has quit  
11:15 <mflorea> has quit  
11:20 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
11:35 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
11:38 <vmassol1> has quit  
12:33 <tmortagne> has quit  
13:14 <vmassol> mflorea: committed  
13:15 <vmassol> I'm sure there are some stuff to fine tune a bit better though but we'll see  
13:15 <mflorea> :) a productive lunch  
13:15 <vmassol> yeah :)  
13:15 <vmassol> I now need to document the rendering for when it's used outside of xwiki  
13:15 <vmassol> since it requires some logging setup  
13:28 <vmassol> mflorea: hmm maybe we could add the 3 logging JARs as runtime dep in the top level POM  
13:28 <vmassol> right now we have to add them everywhere when we run xwiki be it in unit tests, functional tests or distributions  
13:29 <mflorea> sounds good  
13:29 <vmassol> for example http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Commons/job/xwiki-commons-4.3/67/consoleFull , search for SLF4J  
13:29 <vmassol> ok I'll try that  
13:32 <Enygma`> has quit  
13:32 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
13:35 <evalica1> is now known as <evalica>  
13:56 <fmancinelli> has joined #xwiki  
14:26 <vmassol> mflorea: however we still have the problem of logback.xml  
14:27 <vmassol> checking something, there might some way  
14:27 <mflorea> we need to put it in test/resources  
14:27 <vmassol> ther's a better way IMO  
14:27 <vmassol> which is to set it up programmatically  
14:28 <vmassol> and our test module  
14:28 <mflorea> ah, to set the log level for tests  
14:28 <vmassol> which makes it shareable for all tests  
14:28 <vmassol> checking logback doc  
14:28 <vmassol> s/and our test/in our test/  
14:42 <vmassol> so yes it can be done and I think it's the easiest, I'll do that when I get a few minutes  
14:43 <vmassol> (and I'll remove our test logback.xml files - which btw should have been named logback-test.xml)
